title: Google\Cloud\Debugger\GerritSourceContext
name: GerritSourceContext
description: A SourceContext referring to a Gerrit project.

params.name: hostUri
params.description: The URI of a running Gerrit instance.

params.name: gerritProject
params.description: The full project name within the host. Projects may be nested, so "project/subproject" is a valid project name. The "repo name" is hostURI/project.

params.name: aliasContext
params.description: An alias, which may be a branch or tag.
